LEFT JOIN t_member temp_member ON temp_member.member_id = temp_borrowing_loan.member_id LEFT JOIN t_loan_tender temp_loanTender ON temp_loanTender.loan_tender_id = temp_borrowing_loan.loan_tender_id LEFT JOIN t_repayment_type temp_repaymentType ON temp_repaymentType.repayment_type_id = temp_borrowing_loan.repayment_type_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_firstAuditor ON temp_firstAuditor.user_id = temp_borrowing_loan.first_auditor_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_secondAuditor ON temp_secondAuditor.user_id = temp_borrowing_loan.second_auditor_id LEFT JOIN t_member temp_creater ON temp_creater.member_id = temp_borrowing_loan.creater LEFT JOIN t_user temp_updater ON temp_updater.user_id = temp_borrowing_loan.updater
